content: @Sandra Vance Will the sessions be recorded and if so, when will the recordings be available?

Nevermind. I found it in the FAQ ...Q: When will the recordings be available after the event?
A: The presentations will be available by Monday, January 18 on HL7 Education on
Demand. Participants will receive an email with a coupon code allowing
complimentary access to the materials.

Matt Jenks said:

Sandra Vance Will the sessions be recorded and if so, when will the recordings be available?

Hi Matt! Yes - all sessions will be recorded and posted in Whova usually within 24 hours.
Hi. I got the link but I can't find the session I'm looking for.
